EmailTemplate.name: IC Engage_March12_2014.Invite 1
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Client: webinar on risk-free contractor engagement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please join us on Wednesday, March 12 at 1 p.m. ET, when we will hold a free webinar titled "5 Steps to Risk-Free Independent Contractor Engagement <http://www.mbopartners.com/webinars/2014/5-steps-risk-free-independent-contractor-engagement>."
Do you have an efficient - and compliant - independent contractor engagement program in place? During this hour-long webinar, we will discuss the 5 steps you can take to cut risk out of your contractor engagement, as well as streamline the processes you currently have in place. I'll also introduce IC Engage, MBO's new service that's making contractor engagement simple for businesses like yours. Register today <http://www.mbopartners.com/webinars/2014/5-steps-risk-free-independent-contractor-engagement>! ___________________________________ Dave Putt VP, Consultant and Client Services MBO Partners t: 703-793-6020 e: dputt@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
